newsitem.title: USA: Station Casinos gets gaming license.
newsitem.headline: Station Casinos gets gaming license.

text.p: Station Casinos Inc said it has received a non-restricted gaming license from the Nevada Gaming Commission to own and operate Sunset Station Hotel & Casino in the Henderson/Green Valley area of Las Vegas.
The Sunset Station is to open to the public on June 10, Station Casinos said.

The Nevada Gaming Commission voted unanimously to grant the license to Station Casinos, which is already licensed to operate Palace Station Hotel & Casino, Boulder Station Hotel & Casino and Texas Station Gambling Hall & Hotel in Las Vegas.

The licensing grants the company permission to operate full-scale gaming at Sunset Station where the new property's 80,000-square-foot casino will open with more than 2,700 slot/video poker machines, 40 table games, a 10-table poker room and a race and sports book.
